features: Contains: 1- 4 Pound (100 Loads) Bag of Grab Green Natural Water Lily 3in1 Laundry Detergent Powder. Our velcro closure bags are convenient and easy to use, no hassling with frustrating zip closures

Naturally Effective: Specifically formulated to cut through dirt leaving your laundry clean and fresh. Free of any optical brighteners, chlorine or dyes, this powder works on all water temperatures in standard and HE machines

Water Lily: Our powerful laundry detergent, easily measured with the included scoop, provides a sweet and citrusy natural fragrance. Just one scoop in your washer deep-cleans, remove stains, and brightens, all in one

No Harsh Chemicals: Our laundry solutions are septic safe and made from naturally derived plant and mineral based ingredients to ensure the best cleaning products with no phosphates, phthalates, chlorine, toxins, dyes or masking agents

Safer for You, Your Family and the Planet: Grab Green's plant and mineral-based formulas are made with responsibly-sourced, high-quality ingredients that are proudly cruelty-free, never tested on animals and made in the USA
body.description: Save time and money with Grab Green 3 in 1 Laundry Detergent Powder. This concentrated powder feature a superior detergent, remarkable stain remover and beautiful brightener. Tackle your most difficult laundry challenges, without harmful toxins or carcinogens. Our sweet and citrusy water lily fragrance is made with lavender, lavandin, lime and orange essential oils. We responsibly source the highest quality plant and mineral-based ingredients and work directly with our team of organic chemists to create the most effective, naturally-derived, non-toxic formulas. Our thoughtful packaging includes a convenient, easy to use velcro closure, a measuring scoop for easy and efficient measuring, and clear use instructions. We believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA. Our products are eco-responsible and ensure safe and effective cleaning power for a healthy, happy home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our philosophy simply! Cleaning is not only about what you remove, but what you add as well. As a mother of two daughters and two furry four-legged doggies, having a safe and healthy home was always Patricia Spencer’s top priority. She set out to craft Grab Green’s signature eco-responsible and family-safe formulas to not only do the job well, but offer a truly delightful experience. Trusted, go to products. We’re all for that! 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent Powder Our 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent is a superior detergent, remarkable stain remover, and beautiful brightener. Phosphate, optical brighteners, chlorine and dye free, our non-toxic formula is made of naturally-derived ingredients and works for all temperatures for an effective clean without harsh smelly chemicals or known carcinogens. Formulated for all your laundry needs we think it’s the best natural laundry detergent out there and our customers agree! Our biodegradable formula is specifically formulated for high-efficiency (HE) and standard machines.

Our Promise to You. We’ve invested years into scientific development to find the right balance of plant and mineral based ingredients that ensure safe and effective cleaning power! Our concentrated non-toxic formulas are packed with power and are formulated to go beyond existing eco-responsible products and compete with conventional products. Our Promise to You. We love our planet and take every opportunity to use packaging that is recyclable, sustainably harvested, and that utilizes post consumer resins. Our goal is to use as few materials as possible. We also love animals, and make sure our formulas are never tested on them! Our Promise to You. At Grab Green we believe in true Transparency, we want you to know what’s in each product and why. That’s why you’ll find a complete list of ingredients on every product. We promise that our products are made with non-toxic ingredients - no phthalates, solvents, ammonia, phosphates, fillers, optical brighteners, masking agents or dyes. Our Promise to You Our fragrances are designed to envelop you in the beauty of nature. Each has been hand-crafted using essential oils to awaken the mood you seek and leave you feeling enlivened and rejuvenated. Effective Eco-Responsible Healthier Fragrant
Fragrance Free Water Lily Size Available 100 Loads 100 Loads

Choosing the right detergent Among the many safe, naturally-derived, plant and mineral based detergents is Grab Green’s 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent . Though 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent cleans thoroughly, removes big stains, and brightens clothes all at once. Loading the machine properly Make sure all the cuffs on your jeans and shirts are uncuffed,all zippers on jackets are zipped up, all drawstrings on coats and sweats are tightly tied together. Unbutton all buttoned shirts. Check the pockets of all your jeans and coats. Don’t stuff clothes Overloading the washing machine can result in unwanted wrinkles on your garments, and less room for the soapy bubbles to move around. Always leave a little room in your machine to keep your items wrinkle-free and squeaky clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and Clean
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice product. Your clothes come out, clean and smelling very fresh. It’s a very natural, pleasant scent. Subtle and not too “perfumey”. I switched from Tide with Bleach to this, and notice no difference. If you want your clothes to be a little brighter, consider adding one of this company’s bleach pods, which work very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grab Green Natural 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent Powder, Fragrance Free review
reviews.reviewText: I have been replacing my toxic household products with non-toxic products that rate well with EWG (the Environmental Working Group). I have been using Grab Green dishwashing pods for quite awhile now, and decided to try their laundry detergent. I didn't pay attention, and thought the laundry detergent was pods as well. It is a powder. It comes in the same type bag, so I made assumptions without reading the product description well enough. But it's okay. I just throw a scoop full in my front-load washer, just like a I did the pods I was using. It am pleasantly surprised how well this laundry detergent powder works! Wow - better than my previous 'swear-by' product. My laundry REALLY smells fresh and honestly, just odor-free. No stains left on shirt fronts. Wish I'd switched a long time ago. I use fragrance-free products whenever possible, except for my dish soap - I like grapefruit scent (in a nontoxic brand).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I was browsing looking for a lower suds detergent as I'm doing a good deal more laundry by hand these days...and I found this guy and I am so very very happy I did!!First the fragrance is lovely. I am a bit sensitive to floral scents that are so sweet you're sure your blood glucose will start rise any moment. This Water Lily was, for me, a perfect match to the image the name calls up in my mind and the reality; lightly floral, a hint of a 'green' mossy/fairy pond note, feminine but not at all gender exclusionary LOL! And I must tell you that every single word in the description on line and on the package regarding strength re: stains and brightening/overall cleaning actually---shocked the heck outta me!!!! Frankly, I was surprised at the color of the water as an indicator, perhaps, of dirt left behind by one of the 'big boys' detergents...seriously!Fragrance,- lovely and sustained - CHECK (and even a nice waft over and above my fabric softener.....GUYS MAKE A WATER LILY UTRA CONCENTRATED LIQUID FABRIC SOFTENER PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!)Strength/cleaning ability - Great...GREAT stain removal with no additional spot treatment but with a bit of a soak-CHECK CHECKBrightening - Gotta admit, garments just seemed a bit newer or fresher looking - CHECK CHECK CHECKNow, I gave only one category 4 stars while all others got 5 stars and that was packaging...and in a way even that was being a little tough on them. The detergent is a bit finer granule than the leading detergents and once you open the bag there is a zip way to close it after each use with a scooper inside (thank you btw). However, because of the finer granules, over the course of several consecutive uses where the bag may remain open for a bit, the moisture in the air does make it a teeny bit clumpy. I is NOT a big deal and NOT BAD, hence my hesitancy to really mention it, but it was something I did notice. Simultaneously I thought of other possibilities for packaging and the one I thought of immediately was the square with rounded edges type container of some of the stain fighter additive brands; they have that grooved lid which minimizes the moisture and soft bag SPILLAGE issue just by gently placing the cover over the top opening, not even sealing AND your bags could be the REFILS. (This detergent is a bit pricy though really concentrated, and such a more substantial/harder sided container might add to cost, but NOT much if...IF...the bags were re-done as the refills!! Maybe????)Anyway, great product and it's been a while since I was this pleased outta the box....okay, maybe cabin fever too Ha!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Norwex was my favorite until I tried this
reviews.reviewText: So, I'm a bit of a laundry detergent and toilet paper hoarder. Both are something I don't ever want to run out of and I buy a lot of it when it goes on sale. Seriously, the great tp shortage of 2020 didn't touch my family and I shared with others in need of tp. So, I've had lots of different kinds of laundry detergent. Some I can't use because it's too strong for sensitive skin, some I don't like for the heavy smell, and some just doesn't clean as well - included homemade detergent. I ordered this detergent because I wanted to try laundry stripping but didn't want to use Tide. This is the best detergent I've ever tried. My earlier fav was Norwex but I like this better and i think it's a little bit cheaper. It cleans beautifully. I have an old school top loading machine so nothing fancy. I no longer have young kids at with grass stains, etc but I have a husband who works on our cars and is currently encapsulating the space under our house. His clothes were so caked in red mud that he had to undress in the garage and put the clothes in a garbage bag. Seriously, they could have stood up on their own. These clothes came clean in warm water. I was shocked. Another thing I love about this detergent is the smell...or lack thereof. In addition to tp hoarder, I'm also weird about smells. My laundry just smells clean and fresh. Even my workout clothes that get that awful dank sort of musty smell after a while; you know they smell even after being washed; even those clothes smell clean in that they don't smell. I love that. I wear a beautiful expensive perfume I bought in Bermuda. I don't want the smell of my clothes covering up that scent. I'm going to add Grab Green Natural to my subscribe and save.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with a full-tub water washing machine!
reviews.reviewText: - I love the scent, it smells wonderful to me and very clean. 🙂 - What I love best is that it cleans really well and I only need one scoop per load in my washing machine! I have the style where the tub fills with water, not the high-efficiency (HE) type. - I'm so happy that I didn't need to supplement the one-scoop just for a regular load. I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: Works & smells great! Great price. I've tried others and keep coming back to this one!

I use this on all types of clothing. It seems gentle enough, and leaves no residue on dark colors. I switched from Tide-like detergents to powder detergent with misgivings but this product disproved all of them. This powder detergent cleans well, does not leave residue, and leaves clothes feeling good. I am hooked for good.While it's nice they have a fragrance free option, I absolutely love the Water Lily fragrance. You don't need to add any other fragrance product (no beads, no dryer sheets) and laundry comes out soft, smelling fresh and delightful.You need to follow the instructions on quantity thoroughly. I roughly measure only half or even less than half a scoop of detergent for a regular laundry load. I sometimes use a powder bleaching agent. Both go into the bottom of a top loading machine before laundry items.
i really like this detergent, no scent, cleans well. i empty it into a big plastic jug. I do a ton of laundry and am still on my first bag after at least two months!

We have a HE front load washer that was starting to smell moldy/musty and transfer the smells onto our "clean" clothes, even when we drained the washer each time. A repair guy recommended a powder detergent rather than liquid. We bought this one and have no odor issues anymore, so powder residue on clothes.We sprinkle the powder directly onto the clothes, spreading it out rather than dumping it on one spot. Follow the directions on the bag, you don't need to use more detergent than it calls for.

reviews.reviewTitle: As soon as I " Like" something it becomes hard to find... So save some for me!!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product and the scent isn't overpowering for a guy to use. Started using this last year and even a friend or two has made the switch. I do have sensitive skin and so far no issues. Cleans well with no water temperature issues using cool to warm water, there's no residue, excessive soap foam when used as directed , even the rinse water is clearer too!! I wonder if the company will release more of their various scent's in loose powder form.You gotta wonder what the major big brands put in their blends, fore I found that a lot of the dark wash water is actually the color from the fabrics coming out, which is why jeans fade so soon🤔A little of the product DOES go a long way!! Bath towels seem softer too!!Hopefully this brand will always be available and the 4 Lbs sack of 100 loads + is cost efficient.Edit August 12/2019: STILL buying it... Works/ Washes everything so far. Haven't found better yet🤔
Just like all the other Grab Green laundry detergents, this one does not disappoint. Love the fragrance.
